body.p: I celebrated at 8 a.m. There were 39 communicants. Then I wrote to the Warden & the Bp. of London. I preached at Mattins to a large congregation. In the afternoon Ella took me to see Mrs Parker Smith. She came here to tea, and then went to church. I preached at Evensong to a large congregation, which included the Bp. of Durham. Also I wrote to Raleigh. The collections through the day were for the National Schools and amounted to more than £40.
On Wednesday the 16th July, I dined with Lord Portsmouth.
